Values.SQL_MP_DB_CONNECTION_STRING: Connection string to the database containing market participants.
Values.SERVICE_BUS_CONNECTION_STRING: Connection string to the storage account for the integration events.
Values.SERVICE_BUS_HEALTH_CHECK_CONNECTION_STRI: Health connection string to the storage account for the integration events.
Values.SBT_MARKET_PARTICIPANT_CHANGED_NAME: The name of the topic where the integration events are published.
Values.BALANCE_RESPONSIBLE_CHANGED_NOTIFICATION: Balance responsible changed notification to email
Values.AzureB2c:Tenant: The tenant id of the current tenant, e.g. devDataHubB2C.onmicrosoft.com
Values.AzureB2c:SpnId: The client id of the 'sp-b2c-<environment>' service principal with management permissions.
Values.AzureB2c:SpnSecret: The client secret of the 'sp-b2c-<environment>' service principal with management permissions.
Values.AzureB2c:BackendObjectId: The object id of the 'backend-b2b-app' application registration.
Values.AzureB2c:BackendSpnObjectId: The object id of the 'backend-b2b-app' service principal (the enterprise application for the application registration).
Values.AzureB2c:BackendId: The client id of the 'backend-b2b-app' application registration.
